item.description:
Remember the Beach Boy concert in Stamford this last summer ?? for all of us who attended the opening act was non other the "Sharkey and the Unknowns" We grooved to tunes such as the temptations, Smokie Robinson and the Miracles, Marvin Gay - to just name a few - I have been trying to catch up with this band ever since. " At Last" we will road trip to Stamford from happy hour and catch them at Zody's 19 Hole. Don't miss this chance to groove with Motown and dance the night away "ITS TIME TO ROAD TRIP"

Zody's 19 Hole

451 Stillwater Rd

Stamford 203 359 -1919
item.why: Come and Join us for Happy hour at Bear & Grill - let us come out and support Tom as "Captain Rocks " - After happy hour its time to "Rock & Roll" down to Stamford to see "Sharkey and the Unknowns"

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: ANOTHER DOUBLE HEADER "YOU DON"T WANT TO MISS"
